    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1

    Facet RoomRate_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomRate_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomRate_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<RoomRate bookingCode="A1KRACKB" effectiveDate="2017-08-22" expireDate="2018-08-22" expireDateExclusiveInd="true" objID="roomRate_1" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <RoomRateRef>roomRate_1</RoomRateRef>
    <Rate amountBeforeTax="23" currencyCode="USD">12</Rate>
</RoomRate>

      Example JSON

      {
  "RoomRateSummary" : {
    "objID" : "roomRate_1",
    "effectiveDate" : "2017-08-22",
    "expireDate" : "2018-08-22",
    "bookingCode" : "A1KRACKB",
    "expireDateExclusiveInd" : true,
    "Identifier" : {
      "value" : "guid12345",
      "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
      "system" : "sysABC3344",
      "organization" : "Acme"
    },
    "RoomRateRef" : "roomRate_1",
    "Rate" : {
      "value" : 12,
      "amountBeforeTax" : 23,
      "currencyCode" : "USD"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Rate
        Specifies the rate for the room.
        Details
        Type RoomPrice
        Example Value 12
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Properties inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomRate_ID

        Identifier, RoomRateRef

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        effectiveDate
        Specifies the starting date for this room rate.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:date
        Example Value 2017-08-22
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        expireDate
        Specifies the end date for this room rate.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:date
        Example Value 2018-08-22
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        bookingCode
        This is used to indicate the item booked and is primarily used to exchange information with GDSs.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value A1KRACKB
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attributes inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomRate_ID

        objID

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        expireDateExclusiveInd
        When true, the ExpireDate is the first day after the applicable period (e.g. when expire date is Oct 15 the last date of the period is Oct 14).
